com.god.kahit.viewModel

Class StoreViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • ViewModel
      • com.god.kahit.viewModel.StoreViewModel

  • public class StoreViewModel
extends ViewModel
    responsibility: A ViewModel class that handles the information needed for the view. It handles the connection to the Repository which has connection to its model Store. used-by: This class is used in the following classes: StoreView.
